msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).

div.ab: (Col.) 103;;(Pauni 4, continued);;Theagenes, son of Harendotes - (through) Horos, son of Tis - for garden land, for year 13: for apomoira, 19 drachmai 1/2 obol; for olive (transportation), 2 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for naubion, 1 drachme 5 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 4 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 12 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols; for kollybos, 4 1/2 obols. Total: 43 drachmai 1 obol.;And for Parmenion, son of Parmenion, for apomoira, 8 drachmai 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 1 obol; for naubion, 5 obols; for supplements, 2 drachmai 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 5 drachmai 2 1/2 obols; for supplements, 2 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 18 drachmai 2 1/2 obols.;And for Tauris, daughter of Onnophris, for apomoira, 7 drachmai 4 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols; for naubion, 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 2 drachmai; for eparourion, 5 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 2 obols. Total: 17 drachmai 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 80 drachmai 7 obols.);Ptolemaios, son of Phanomgeus and Taptosiris, grandson of Phanomgeus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 62;Athenion, son of Horos and Heras, grandson of Pakysis: 20 drachmai; column 73;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris and Thaesis, grandson of Heras: 4 drachmai; column 69;Heras, son of Onnophris and Sopas, grandson of Onnophris, for ch(--): 28 obols; column 72;Aphrodisios, son of Sisois and Thaisas, grandson of Petheus: 4 drachmai; column 65;Pnepheros, son of Petalos and Taeuemeros, grandson of Petaus: 8 drachmai 28 obols; column 77;Petaus, son of Petheus and Taseus, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 80;Petesouchos, son of Hatres and Tapetheus, grandson of Petheus: 28 obols; column 82;Soeris, daughter of Hatres - (through) Hatres the weaver - for apomoira, 1 drachme 5 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 3 obols; for eparourion, 1 drachme 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 4 drachmai 2 obols.;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 1 1/2 obols; for supplements: 2 chalkoi; for kollybos: 2 chalkoi. Total: 2 obols. (In left margin: 4 drachmai 11 obols.);Heron also called Heraklas, son of Karanos and Artemis, grandson of Heraklas: 20 drachmai; column 20;Apitas, son of Kastor and Petronia, grandson of Apitas, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 84;Sarapion, son of Harpallos and Tapetheus, grandson of Sarapion: 4 drachmai 27 obols; column 85;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis and Tasoucharion, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 92;Sopatra, daughter of Maron - (through) Lupus, slaughterer of calves - for apomoira, 3 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 3 1/2 obols; for naubion, 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 drachme; for eparourion, 2drachmai 3 obols; for supplements, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 obol. Total: 8 drachmai 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 8 drachmai 8 obols.);Total for the day: 428 drachmai 18 obols.;;On the 5th, similalry:;Harpochation, son of Posis, through Ptollarous, daughter of Horion - (through) Orkelses - for apomoira, 5 drachmai 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 5 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 4 drachmai; for supplements, 2 obols; for kollybos, 1 1/2 obols. Total: 13 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 16 drachmai 17 obols.);And for Marcus Longinus Clemens, through the same woman, for apomoira, 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 1 obol; for naubion, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 2 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.;And for Thaesis, daughter of Sokrates: for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14, 4 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.;(Continued on col. 104)
